title: Robot Sounds - Sound Effects
longDescription:
Hi Dev!

In this package you will have access to the sound of male and female robotic voices for several different situations.


Check the preview

Check the documentation



Variety

You will have a series of different emotions represented by professional voice artists who were hired for this! There are more than 150 voices per genre, remembering that if you increase the pitch in your engine you will have a more cartoonish voice, while if you decrease the pitch you will have a monstrous voice, thus guaranteeing a vast amount of possibilities.


Quality

As previously stated, these sounds were recorded by professional artists for a visual novel package and later professionally edited, ensuring the best possible quality for your project!


Bonus

The package itself is about the voices, but you will also get some folders of beeps, alarms, movements, glitches and some other useful themes for robots! Guaranteeing even more sounds.


Helping each other

If you invest in this package it will help me continue creating these sounds and you will also receive a large amount of audio.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 407

Number of Audio Cues: 407

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz): 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) The one that does contains loop on the name

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Check the documentation

Important/Additional Notes: The cover is made from NightCafe and allowed for commercial use by NightCafe.
